hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that Hamzah bin 'Amr said:O Messenger of Allah, I am a man who fasts, so should I fast while traveling? He said: "If you wish then fast, and if you wish then do not fast

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى هِشَامِ بْنِ عُرْوَةَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Differences in the Report from Hisham 'Urwah about it
